Package ohos.ai.cv.common

Class BoundingBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.ai.cv.common.BoundingBox

  • public class BoundingBox
extends Object
    Provides a bounding box that determines the rectangle of the detected text.
    Since:
    1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoundingBox​()
      Default constructor used to create a BoundingBox instance.
      BoundingBox​(int left, int top, int width, int height)
      A constructor used to create a BoundingBox instance using the input parameters left, top, width, and height.

    • Method Summary

      • BoundingBox

      • BoundingBox

        public BoundingBox​(int left,
                   int top,
                   int width,
                   int height)
        A constructor used to create a BoundingBox instance using the input parameters left, top, width, and height.
        Parameters:
        left - Indicates the horizontal coordinate of the upper left corner of the bounding box, in pixels.
        top - Indicates the vertical coordinate of the upper left corner of the bounding box, in pixels.
        width - Indicates the width of the bounding box.
        height - Indicates the height of the bounding box.
        Since:
        1
